text: hrux phu dı lea ca reim nı kar srang læw thrng hı man keid khun ma xik khrang hnung læa phu dı thrng prathan paccay yangchiph kæ phwk cea cak fak fa læa phændin ca mi phracea xun khukheiyng kab xallxh xik hrux? Cng klaw theid (muhammad) “cng na hlakthan khxng phwk than ma hak phwk than pen phu saty cring”
